original_text: And also that every man should eat and drink, and enjoy the good of all his labour, it is the gift of God.
korean_text: 사람마다 먹고 마시는 것과 수고함으로 낙을 누리는 그것이 하나님의 선물인 줄도 또한 알았도다

sentences.original_text: And also that every man should eat and drink,
and enjoy the good of all his labour,
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 수고의 좋은 것을 즐기며

sentences.original_text: it is the gift of God.
